data.name: pyview
data.description: GUI + API for processing and visualizing Calcium imaging data.  Largely based on the IDL software "VIEW" developed by Giovanni Galizia. Implemented in Python by Ajayrama Kumaraswamy

evidence: "Welcome to the repository containing the python implementation of PyView" and owner is GitHub org `galizia-lab`, indicating a lab-based project.

"PyView is a general purpose tool to analyze calcium imaging data of responses to sensory stimuli. It provides a powerful GUI to interactively visualize, analyse and assess the quality of imaging stacks" (end-user analysis application).

Installation and use are via GitHub source and tags: "Take note tag of the latest release of PyView from here" and "pip install git+https://git@github.com/galizia-lab/pyview.git@<tag name>"; users may also "get a ZIP or TARBALL of the source code of the lastest release of PyView here".
